cache_inode_create.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00087 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00088 #include "config.h"
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #include "LRU_List.h"
00092 #include "log_functions.h"
00093 #include "HashData.h"
00094 #include "HashTable.h"
00095 #include "fsal.h"
00096 #include "cache_inode.h"
00097 #include "stuff_alloc.h"
00098 
00099 #include <unistd.h>
00100 #include <sys/types.h>
00101 #include <sys/param.h>
00102 #include <time.h>
00103 #include <pthread.h>

00106 
00107 cache_entry_t * cache_inode_create( cache_entry_t            * pentry_parent, 
00108                                     fsal_name_t              * pname, 
00109                                     cache_inode_file_type_t    type,
00110                                     fsal_accessmode_t          mode,
00111                                     cache_inode_create_arg_t * pcreate_arg,
00112                                     fsal_attrib_list_t       * pattr, 
00113                                     hash_table_t             * ht,  
00114                                     cache_inode_client_t     * pclient, 
00115                                     fsal_op_context_t        * pcontext, 
00116                                     cache_inode_status_t     * pstatus )
00117 {
00118   cache_entry_t           * pentry = NULL ;
00119   fsal_status_t           fsal_status ;
00120   fsal_handle_t           object_handle ;
00121   fsal_attrib_list_t      parent_attributes ;
00122   fsal_attrib_list_t      object_attributes ;
00123   fsal_handle_t           dir_handle ;
00124   cache_inode_fsal_data_t fsal_data ;
00125   cache_inode_status_t    status ;
00126 
00127   /* Set the return default to CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS */
00128   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00129   
00130   /* stats */
00131   pclient->stat.nb_call_total += 1 ;
00132   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00133   
00134   /* Check if the required type is correct, with this function, we manage file, dir and symlink */
00135   if( type != REGULAR_FILE && type != DIR_BEGINNING && type != SYMBOLIC_LINK
00136       && type != SOCKET_FILE && type != FIFO_FILE && type != CHARACTER_FILE
00137       && type != BLOCK_FILE )
00138     {
00139       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_BAD_TYPE ;
00140 
00141       /* stats */
00142       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00143       
00144       return NULL ;
00145     }
00146   
00147   /* Check if an entry of the same name exists */
00148   if( ( pentry = cache_inode_lookup( pentry_parent, 
00149                                      pname,
00150                                      &parent_attributes, 
00151                                      ht, 
00152                                      pclient, 
00153                                      pcontext, 
00154                                      pstatus ) ) != NULL )
00155     {
00156       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS ;
00157       
00158       if( pentry->internal_md.type != type )
00159         {
00160           /* Incompatible types, returns NULL */
00161           
00162           /* stats */
00163           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00164 
00165           return NULL ;
00166         }
00167       else
00168         {
00169           /* stats */
00170           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_success[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00171       
00172           /* redondant creation, returned the previously created entry */
00173           return pentry ;
00174         }
00175     }
00176 
00177   /* At this point, the entry was not found, this means that is doesn't exist is FSAL, we can create it */
00178 
00179 
00180   /* Get the lock for the parent*/
00181    P( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00182 
00183    if( pentry_parent->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00184      dir_handle = pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00185    
00186    if( pentry_parent->internal_md.type == DIR_CONTINUE )
00187      {
00188        P( pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->lock ) ;
00189        dir_handle = pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00190        V( pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->lock ) ;
00191      }
00192    
00193    object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask  ;
00194    switch( type )
00195      {
00196      case REGULAR_FILE: 
00197        fsal_status = FSAL_create( &dir_handle,
00198                                   pname, 
00199                                   pcontext,  
00200                                   mode, 
00201                                   &object_handle, 
00202                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00203        break ; 
00204        
00205      case DIR_BEGINNING:
00206        fsal_status = FSAL_mkdir( &dir_handle,
00207                                  pname, 
00208                                  pcontext,
00209                                  mode, 
00210                                  &object_handle, 
00211                                  &object_attributes ) ;
00212                                  
00213        break ;
00214        
00215      case SYMBOLIC_LINK:
00216        fsal_status = FSAL_symlink( &dir_handle,
00217                                    pname, 
00218                                    &pcreate_arg->link_content,
00219                                    pcontext, 
00220                                    mode, 
00221                                    &object_handle, 
00222                                    &object_attributes ) ;
00223        break ;
00224      
00225      case SOCKET_FILE:
00226        fsal_status = FSAL_mknode( &dir_handle,
00227                                   pname,
00228                                   pcontext,
00229                                   mode,
00230                                   FSAL_TYPE_SOCK,
00231                                   NULL, /* no dev_t needed for socket file */
00232                                   &object_handle, 
00233                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00234        break ;
00235                                   
00236      case FIFO_FILE:
00237        fsal_status = FSAL_mknode( &dir_handle,
00238                                   pname,
00239                                   pcontext,
00240                                   mode,
00241                                   FSAL_TYPE_FIFO,
00242                                   NULL, /* no dev_t needed for FIFO file */
00243                                   &object_handle, 
00244                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00245        break ;
00246 
00247      case BLOCK_FILE:
00248        fsal_status = FSAL_mknode( &dir_handle,
00249                                   pname,
00250                                   pcontext,
00251                                   mode,
00252                                   FSAL_TYPE_BLK,
00253                                   &pcreate_arg->dev_spec,
00254                                   &object_handle, 
00255                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00256        break ;
00257 
00258      case CHARACTER_FILE:
00259        fsal_status = FSAL_mknode( &dir_handle,
00260                                   pname,
00261                                   pcontext,
00262                                   mode,
00263                                   FSAL_TYPE_CHR,
00264                                   &pcreate_arg->dev_spec,
00265                                   &object_handle, 
00266                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00267        break ;
00268        
00269      default:
00270        /* we should never go there */
00271        *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_INCONSISTENT_ENTRY ;
00272        V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00273 
00274          /* stats */
00275        pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00276 
00277        return NULL ;
00278        break ;
00279      }
00280    
00281    /* Check for the result */
00282    if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00283      {
00284        *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00285        V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00286 
00287        if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00288         {
00289           cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00290 
00291           DisplayLog( "cache_inode_create: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p", pentry_parent ) ;
00292 
00293           if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry_parent, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00294             DisplayLog( "cache_inode_create: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry_parent, kill_status ) ;
00295 
00296           *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00297         }
00298 
00299        /* stats */
00300        pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00301            
00302        return NULL ;
00303      }
00304    else
00305      { 
00306        fsal_data.handle = object_handle ;
00307        fsal_data.cookie = DIR_START ;
00308 
00309        /* This call will return NULL if failed */
00310        if( ( pentry = cache_inode_new_entry( &fsal_data, 
00311                                              &object_attributes,
00312                                              type, 
00313                                              pcreate_arg,
00314                                              NULL, 
00315                                              ht, 
00316                                              pclient, 
00317                                              pcontext, 
00318                                              TRUE, /* This is a creation and not a population */
00319                                              pstatus ) ) == NULL )
00320          {
00321            *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_INSERT_ERROR ;
00322            V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00323            
00324            /* stats */
00325            pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00326 
00327            return NULL ;
00328          }
00329 
00330 #ifdef TITITITI /* BUGAZOMEU */
00331        /* If the parent directory has not been readdir, we need to populate it first */
00332        if( pentry_parent->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00333          {
00334            if( pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir != CACHE_INODE_YES )
00335              {
00336                /* Populate the pdir_chain */
00337                if( cache_inode_readdir_populate( pentry_parent, 
00338                                                  ht, 
00339                                                  pclient,
00340                                                  pcontext, 
00341                                                  pstatus ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00342                  {
00343                     /* stats */
00344                    pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00345            
00346                    /* Release the lock */
00347                    V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00348                      
00349                    return NULL ;
00350                  }
00351              }
00352          }
00353 #endif
00354        
00355        /* Add this entry to the directory */
00356        if( cache_inode_add_cached_dirent( pentry_parent,
00357                                           pname, 
00358                                           pentry, 
00359                                           NULL,
00360                                           ht,
00361                                           pclient,
00362                                           pcontext,
00363                                           pstatus ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ) 
00364          {
00365            V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00366 
00367            /* stats */
00368            pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00369 
00370            return NULL ;
00371          }  
00372      }
00373 
00374    /* Update the parent cached attributes */
00375 
00376    if( pentry_parent->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00377      {
00378        pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.seconds  = time( NULL ) ;
00379        pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.nseconds = 0 ;
00380        pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.attributes.ctime = pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime ;
00381        
00382        /* if the created object is a directory, it contains a link
00383         * to its parent : '..'. Thus the numlink attr must be increased.
00384         */
00385        if ( type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00386        {
00387          pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.attributes.numlinks ++;
00388        }
00389        
00390      }
00391    else
00392      {
00393        /* DIR_CONTINUE */
00394        pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.seconds  = time( NULL ) ;
00395        pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.seconds  = 0 ;
00396        pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.attributes.ctime = 
00397          pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime ;
00398        
00399        /* if the created object is a directory, it contains a link
00400         * to its parent : '..'. Thus the numlink attr must be increased.
00401         */
00402        if ( type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00403        {
00404          pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.attributes.numlinks ++;
00405        }
00406 
00407      }
00408    
00409    
00410    /* Get the attributes in return */
00411    *pattr = object_attributes ;
00412 
00413    /* valid the parent */
00414    *pstatus = cache_inode_valid( pentry_parent, CACHE_INODE_OP_SET, pclient ) ;  
00415    
00416    /* release the lock for the parent*/
00417    V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00418 
00419    /* stat */
00420    if( *pstatus != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00421      pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00422    else
00423      pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_success[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00424  
00425   return pentry ;
00426 } /* cache_inode_create */
00427

Generated on Wed Apr 9 08:24:52 2008 for Cache inode layer by  1.3.9.1
